name: PixelCube SIM
description:
PixelCube Sim Will Turn Any Of Your Images Into A 3D Canvas Of Cubes Where Each Cube Repreasents A Pixel In The Image, Like This:

You Can Also Enable Physics In The Canvas Settings, So You Could Blow Up The Canvas With Cannonballs And See How Much Objects Can Your Computer Handle!

--

You Can Also Play Around With Physics Settings, Image Scaling, Background Environment, And More To Get The Perfect Canvas, Which You Can Later Take A Screenshot Of And Share With Your Friends!

--

Daytime + Sunset Skyboxes: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-hdr-sky-612...

Night Skybox Made With: https://tools.wwwtyro.net/space-3d/index.html

Source Code: https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/Cube-Canvas-Sim
